text-homepage: Whether you’re aiming to improve your grammar, expand your vocabulary, or prepare for exams, I provide personalized lessons that cater to your individual needs. Together, we’ll build confidence in your English skills and help you reach your goals—one step at a time.

about.title: About.
about.header: Empowering Minds with Marketing Expertise and Strategic Insight
about.text: I’m an enthusiastic and dedicated English tutor with 25 years of experience. My teaching style focuses on customising lessons to fit each student’s unique learning goals—whether it’s enhancing communication skills, preparing for exams, or improving writing techniques. I aim to foster a positive, motivating space where you can grow your English proficiency at your own pace and with confidence. Let’s embark on this learning journey together!
about.year: years of experience teaching at universities worldwide
about.students: of students guided through effective exam preparation strategies
about.articles: prestigious international journals and renowned academic conferences

lessons.title: Lessons.
lessons.text: I offer English lessons for all levels and ages, from beginners (A1) to advanced learners (C1). Whether you’re a young child, a teenager, or an adult, I provide tailored courses to meet your specific needs and goals.

list.title: For Kids (10+ years old)
list.backText: Fun, interactive lessons that engage young learners and build a strong foundation in English.

list.title: For Teens & Adults
list.backText: Focus on grammar, vocabulary, speaking, writing, and listening to improve fluency and confidence.

list.title: Exam Preparation
list.backText: I offer specialized training for exams like IELTS, FCE, TOEFL, and others to help you achieve your desired scores.

list.title: Business English
list.backText: Enhance professional communication with courses on emails, presentations, meetings, and negotiations.

list.title: Specialized Courses
list.backText: Tailored lessons in areas like English for Travel, English for Academic Purposes, and Conversational English.
